value.title: StarCraft 2: PROFESSIONAL 2v2?! (Maru & sOs vs MaxPax & souL)
value.excerpt: The standard competitive mode in StarCraft 2 is 1v1. However the OlimoLeague recently put on an event where they invited three teams of progamers to face off in a 2v2 (2 vs 2) event. In this video I cast a best-of-5 between Maru and sOs on one team, and MaxPax and souL on the other.  OlimoLeague on Patreon:

value.title: Flo pulls off 69 IQ defense after BAITING all-in | Florencio Files #277 - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: I cast one of the mysterious and deranged StarCraft 2 builds of the one and only, Florencio, the dude that invented the Protoss proxy nexus recall rush. In this episode, the Sewer Mermaid has a very good strat that deals a lot of damage. But is it enough against such a good opponent?  🧜Florencio Files
